fields.name: hasPrecipitation
fields.description: The field for the hasPrecipitation record component.

fields.name: temperature
fields.description: The field for the temperature record component.

fields.name: temperatureModifier
fields.description: The field for the temperatureModifier record component.

fields.name: downfall
fields.description: The field for the downfall record component.

constructors.name: ClimateSettings
constructors.description: Creates an instance of a ClimateSettings record class.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code value for this object. The value is derived from the hash code of each of the record components.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. Reference components are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object) ; primitive components are compared with '=='.

methods.name: hasPrecipitation
methods.description: Returns the value of the hasPrecipitation record component.

methods.name: temperature
methods.description: Returns the value of the temperature record component.

methods.name: temperatureModifier
methods.description: Returns the value of the temperatureModifier record component.

methods.name: downfall
methods.description: Returns the value of the downfall record component.
